content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
Both furnaces process iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Plate Production
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) processing copper ore into copper plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Located around position(9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5)
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 11 electronic circuits
- Two burner inserters:
  - At position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
  - At position(11.5, 11.5) moving items from assembler to output chest

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water at positions(-9.5,23.5),(-8.5,23.5),(-8.5,22.5),(-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam pipe at position(-5.5, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

### Research Lab
Lab conducting logistics research, currently working with 15 automation science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Resource shortage errors
- Monitor inventory levels of key resources (coal, iron ore, copper ore)
- Harvest resources before they run out to maintain continuous production

### Inserter waiting errors
- Ensure source containers have items available for inserters to pick up
- Check if destination containers have space available

### Assembly machine ingredient shortage
- Keep a steady supply of all required ingredients (iron plates and copper cables)
- Balance production of intermediate products to match consumption rates

### Power system management
- Maintain adequate coal supply in boiler to prevent power outages
- Monitor steam and water levels in the power generation system
